attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the swift deportation by the Home Office of the radical islamist cleric Abu Qatada whom is currently challenging his deportation from the UK.

Abu Qatada has been described by a British High Court judge as Osama bin Laden's right-hand man in Europe, and is known as dangerous influential extremist with ties to 9/11 attacks. This is a call for a man who insights murder against our people, who is too dangerous to live in Britain.
